metadata.title: Social Income
metadata.description: Social Income is a non-profit organization that provides unconditional cash transfers to people in need.
metadata.keywords: Social Income, Basic Income, Unconditional Cash Transfers, Non Profit, NGO

sdg.sdg1-mission-2: is to reduce poverty in all its forms.
sdg.sdg2-mission-2: is to end hunger and ensure access to nutritious food.
sdg.sdg3-mission-2: is to ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all.
sdg.sdg4-mission-2: is to provide inclusive and equitable quality education.
sdg.sdg5-mission-2: is to achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls.
sdg.sdg6-mission-2: is to ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all.
sdg.sdg7-mission-2: is to ensure access to affordable, reliable, and sustainable energy for all.
sdg.sdg8-mission-2: is to promote inclusive and sustainable economic growth, employment, and decent work for all.
sdg.sdg9-mission-2: is to build resilient infrastructure and foster innovation.
sdg.sdg10-mission-2: is to reduce inequality within and among countries.
sdg.sdg11-mission-2: is to make cities inclusive, safe, resilient, and sustainable.
sdg.sdg12-mission-2: is to ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns.
sdg.sdg13-mission-2: is to take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
sdg.sdg14-mission-2: is to conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas, and marine resources.
sdg.sdg15-mission-2: is to protect, restore, and promote the sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems.
sdg.sdg16-mission-2: is to promote peaceful and inclusive societies and ensure access to justice for all.
sdg.sdg17-mission-2: is to strengthen global partnerships for sustainable development.
